title: I was not given pi and exp in a game of 51 minutes

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hello everyone, I would like to report a problem, as you can see in the pictures, I did not get Pi and Exp, this problem occurred because the server closed when I left the game, the game was saved but received no reward, I would like a solution Since the game lasted a total of 54 minutes.

Excuse my English helped me with the translator since I obviously do not speak English fluently because I do not finish my English course.

It should be clarified that this is a smurf account and that I am from another server and I did not find where to report my problem in support.

Thanks.

Excuse the error in the title, the game hard 54m.

replies.body: We'd be happy to take a look into this and help out with your specific issue individually.  We can see if the match did provide IP or if there was a problem with the match saving to the servers.  To find out, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
